text: Yogen-sha wa kare-ra ni,`makotoni arrā wa, tārūto o anata gata no ue ni,-ō to shite ninmei sa reta.' To itta. Kare-ra wa itta. `Kare ga dōshite, watashi-tachi no ō ni nareyou ka. Watashi-tachi koso, kare yori mo ō ni fusawashī. Mata kare wa tomi ni mo megumarete inai.' Kare (yogen-sha) wa itta. `Arrā wa, anata gata no ue ni kare o erabi, kare no chishiki to tairyoku o tsuyome rareta. Arrā wa o kokoronikanau-sha ni, ōken o sadzuke rareru. Arrā wa atsu Shi ni shite zenchi de ara reru
